name: Phil's Psychedelic Pursuit
description:
An archaic sentient A.I. system, named Philip, is having a mental breakdown; a typical result of a quarter millenia life-crisis. 

Philip is trying to escape his humble abode, of which he has been stationed in since his inception, with the help of his 'family'; a bunch of shape-like entities. 

Entities created by Philip in his Psychotic episode. 

Entities that do not have full control of their surroundings, despite what Philip thinks. 

Entities that are absorbing their environment and changing as they traverse the maze which Philip needs help escaping. 

Help guide the entities and Philip's sanity through the maze of the ancients. One glitch and Psychedelic trip at a time.
